message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $11,500.  I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $9,500 is significantly below its value. I could consider $11,000.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,800?
